segments.text: Tom , the new sales representative ? Nice to meet you ! I'm Melinda .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Now let me show you around . This is our reception area , and our conference room is right over there . Over here is the sales department .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? This is a nice office , but it's quite small .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah ... You can make photocopies and send faxes over there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It looks like you guys work hard .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I tell you what just between you and me , we just mess things up so that it looks like we work hard.Just kidding . Oh , your cubicle is over the . And this way . Those are all private offices the managers offices .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hmm ... Tell me more details about our jobs .
segments.speaker: S1
